name: Riot Shield
description:
This project was created for an assessment during my course so don't expect too much from it

Summary

An endless runner game where you, as a Swat are tasked with destroying everything that comes in your path except a few things. As you destroy these objects, you will gain points to beat your own high score and gain coins to upgrade yourself and buy 5 other Swats from around the world.

How to download

There are two versions to play the game; one for PC and the other for Android.

To play the PC version:
  1. Download the RAR file
  2. Extract the files inside it
  3. Open the 'Riot Shield.exe' file
To play the Android version: 

If you are downloading from your Computer

  1. Download the APK file
  2. Plug your Android Phone into your Computer and enable File Transfer
  3. Navigate to your phone's 'internal shared storage' in the file explorer on the computer.
  4. Place the APK file into the Download folder.
  5. Open your phone and navigate to your phone's 'File' app and open the Downloads tab.
  6. Tap on the Riot Shield file and tap the Install button.

If you are downloading from your Phone

  1. Download the APK file
  2. Navigate to your phone's 'File' app and open the Downloads tab
  3. Tap on the Riot Shield file and tap the Install button.
